mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, USER_ID, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID ) VALUES ( TB_NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{noticeContent}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_ID = #{updatedId} WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
